title: SelectionSort
text: Imagine you have a messy pile of boxes with numbers on them, and your job is to line them up from the smallest number to the biggest number. We’re going to use Selection Sort to do that. It’s easy and fun! Ready?

title: SelectionSort
text: Here’s the first step: Look at all the numbers in front of you. Your job is to find the smallest number in the list. When you find it, we’ll move it to the front of the line.

title: SelectionSort
feedback_right: Great job! 1 is the smallest number. Now let’s move it to the first position!
feedback_wrong: Not quite! Please try again! Remember, we are trying to select the box that contains the smallest number

title: SelectionSort
text: Now that we’ve found the smallest number, let’s swap it with the number that’s currently in the first position.

title: SelectionSort
text: Look! Now 1 is in the first spot. This is the first step of Selection Sort!

title: SelectionSort
text: Next, we ignore the first number because it’s already in its right spot. Now, look at the rest of the numbers: 3, 5, 8, 7. Can you find the smallest one?
feedback_right: Awesome! 3 is the smallest. Since it’s already in the right spot, we don’t need to swap. Let’s keep going!
feedback_wrong: Not quite! Please try again! Remember, we're ignoring 1. What is the next smallest box?

title: SelectionSort
text: Let’s move on to the next group: 5, 8, 7. What’s the smallest number?
feedback_right: You got it! 5 is the smallest, and it’s in the right spot. Now, for the final two numbers: 8 and 7.
feedback_wrong: Not quite! Please try again! Remember, we've already selected 1 and 3 so we can ignore those boxes. What is the next smallest box?

title: SelectionSort
text: And there you have it! The list is now perfectly sorted: 1, 3, 5, 7, 8. You’ve just completed Selection Sort! All we did was keep finding the smallest number and placing it in the right spot.

title: SelectionSort
text: Want to practice? Try sorting this list by yourself using the same steps. Remember, keep finding the smallest number and move it to the right spot!

title: SelectionSort
text: Give it a try, and I’ll be here if you need help!

title: SelectionSort
text: Great job learning Selection Sort! Now you know how to put numbers in order like a pro. Ready to move on to the next sorting trick?
